programme.desc: The No. 2 Cavaliers (24-6) face the No. 3 Tigers (23-9) in the ACC Tournament semifinals. Virginia defeated 2022 NCAA runner-up North Carolina in the quarterfinals 68-59 behind Jayden Gardner's double-double. Clemson easily eliminated NC State 80-54.
